abstract: Funding for this work was from the Shenyang Major Science and Technology Innovation R&D Program (JY2020-9-018 to Y. Chen), and the National Science and Technology Major Projects (2018ZX10731301-003, 2018ZX10731301-009 and 2018ZX10731301-010 to L. Bi).
affiliations: National Science and Technology Major Projects (2018ZX10731301-003, 2018ZX10731301-009 and 2018ZX10731301-010 to L. Bi)
author: Xiaodan Wang; Joy Fleming; Yongyu Liu; Moxin Cheng; Yaguo Wang; Chang Liu; Ye Gu; Yanhong Yu; Lichao Fan; Yu Chen; Lijun Bi
title: Active or latent tuberculosis increases susceptibility to COVID-19 and disease severity

National Science and Technology Major Projects
